Title: Captive
Writer: Michael Brandt (developed by), Derek Haas (developed by), Dick Wolf (created by), Matt Olmstead (created by), Gavin Harris, Gwen Sigan (story editor), Kinan Copen (story editor)
Actors: Jason Beghe, Jon Seda, Jesse Lee Soffer, Tracy Spiridakos
Plot: Atwater disappears at the house of a convicted felon and Intelligence tries to rescue him.
